title: Socio-Humanistic Integrated Education for Fostering an Engineering Project Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental engineering concepts and awareness of social issues
context.additional_context: Step-by-step learning reflecting actual engineering project structures combined with humanities-based evaluation to enhance learners' social responsibility

learning_goals: Learners can analyze decision-making that considers social impact during engineering projects with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply humanities-based evaluation criteria at least three times in the process of solving real-world engineering problems through team-based projects.
Learners can present completed project outcomes orally/written and propose at least five strategies for creating social value.

resources: Social Science Textbooks and Case Studies
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
